部: (bu) - parte, departamento (em uma organização), divisão, escritório; clube; parte, componente, elemento; categoria
部位: (ぶい) - part; position (in a whole, i.e. body)
部内: (ぶない) - the staff; inside the department
部分一致: (ぶぶんいっち) - partial match; matching a search term with sub-string within a field
部分全体関係: (ぶぶんぜんたいかんけい) - part-whole relation; partitive relation
部分冠詞: (ぶぶんかんし) - partitive article (i.e. "du" in French)
部分割: (ぶぶんかつ) - meroblastic cleavage; partial cleavage
部分参照子: (ぶぶんさんしょうし) - reference modifier
部分属性要求: (ぶぶんぞくせいようきゅう) - partial-attribute-request
部分情報構造: (ぶぶんじょうほうこうぞう) - partial information structure
部分文字列: (ぶぶんもじれつ) - partial (character) string; substring
部分溶融: (ぶぶんようゆう) - partial fusion; partial melting
部分的肺静脈還流異常: (ぶぶんてきはいじょうみゃくかんりゅういじょう) - partial anomalous pulmonary venous connection; PAPVC; partial anomalous pulmonary venous drainage; PAPVD; partial anomalous pulmonary venous return; PAPVR
部分肺静脈還流異常: (ぶぶんはいじょうみゃくかんりゅういじょう) - partial anomalous pulmonary venous connection; PAPVC; partial anomalous pulmonary venous drainage; PAPVD; partial anomalous pulmonary venous return; PAPVR
部分肺静脈還流異常症: (ぶぶんはいじょうみゃくかんりゅういじょうしょう) - partial anomalous pulmonary venous connection; PAPVC; partial anomalous pulmonary venous drainage; PAPVD; partial anomalous pulmonary venous return; PAPVR
部分配列添字: (ぶぶんはいれつそえじ) - section subscript
部分麻酔: (ぶぶんますい) - local anesthetic; local anaesthetic
部厚い: (ぶあつい) - bulky; massive; thick; heavy
部品番号: (ぶひんばんごう) - part number; PN
部品表: (ぶひんひょう) - bill of material
部外秘: (ぶがいひ) - restricted to the department
部外者: (ぶがいしゃ) - outsider; someone outside of a group
部局: (ぶきょく) - department; bureau; section; part
部屋を散らかす: (へやをちらかす) - to scatter a room (with things); to leave a room a mess; to leave things lying about
部屋を空ける: (へやをあける) - to clear a room
部屋付きの親方: (へやつきのおやかた) - {sumo} coach associated with another coach's stable
部屋住み: (へやずみ) - an adult-age eldest son who has yet to come into his inheritance; (a young adult still) living at home; a dependent
部屋別総当り: (へやべつそうあたり) - {sumo} rule prohibiting match-ups between wrestlers from the same stable
部屋子: (へやご) - young adult still living at home/dependent; female servant working for a lady-in-waiting working in the inner part of a lord's house (Edo period); freeloader living in a samurai's house; young kabuki actor in service of a master (Edo period)
部屋干し: (へやぼし) - indoor drying; hanging clothes to dry indoors
部屋持ちの親方: (へやもちのおやかた) - {sumo} coach who owns his own stable
部屋方: (へやがた) - female servant hired at a lady-in-waiting's own expense
部屋着: (へやぎ) - dressing gown; housedress; house coat; peignoir
部屋頭: (へやがしら) - {sumo} highest ranked wrestler in a stable
部屋食: (へやしょく) - meal (esp. dinner) served in one's room (at a ryokan)
部所: (ぶしょ) - one's post; one's station; department; bureau; section
部民: (ぶみん) - people belonging to a hereditary occupation group (Yamato period)
部民制: (べみんせい) - system of rule during the Yamato period
部活動: (ぶかつどう) - club activities; extracurricular activities
部派仏教: (ぶはぶっきょう) - Nikaya (early sectarian) Buddhism
部落: (ぶらく) - hamlet/subunit of village; burakumin area
部落民: (ぶらくみん) - Burakumin (modern-day descendants of Japan's feudal outcast group)
部落解放運動: (ぶらくかいほううんどう) - Buraku Liberation Movement
部長: (ぶちょう) - head (chief, director) of a section or department; head of a (school) club/head of a (school) team
部長付: (ぶちょうづき) - assistant (to general manager)
部長代理: (ぶちょうだいり) - deputy section or department manager
部長閲: (ぶちょうえつ) - revised by section chief
部門: (bumon) - divisão (de um grupo maior), ramo, área, classe (subclasse), grupo, categoria, departamento
